proposal1.heroHeadline: Unleashed is losing 1,200 hours a year on proposal writing. Here's why it matters.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, manual proposal creation eats up valuable hours. With our AI, generate them in just 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are the ongoing financial and operational losses Unleashed faces with current proposal practices.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal takes two hours of your team's time. With 600 proposals a year, that‚Äôs 1,200 hours not spent on technical innovation.

problems.title: Opportunity Cost
problems.description: Every hour spent on proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. At an average deal size of $50,000, missing just 1% equates to $300,000 lost annually.

problems.title: Human Error
problems.description: Manual entries lead to 5% error rate. These errors cost you $10,000 in corrections and lost trust every year.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent branding in proposals leads to a 10% decrease in client confidence. This can translate to $100,000 in potential revenue lost.

problems.title: Employee Burnout
problems.description: Repetitive task fatigue causes a 15% drop in productivity across your 30-person team. This is the equivalent of losing 4.5 full-time employees' output.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: Slow proposal generation means delayed responses. Missing the first responder advantage costs you an estimated $50,000 in missed opportunities yearly.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these losses with efficiency and precision.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, each proposal takes hours to craft manually. Our AI generates a complete proposal in 47 seconds, freeing up valuable time.

solutions.title: Brand Consistency
solutions.description: Manual processes lead to inconsistent branding. Our system ensures every proposal aligns with Unleashed‚Äôs brand standards effortlessly.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Human errors creep into manual work. Our AI minimizes errors, safeguarding against costly mistakes and enhancing client trust.

solutions.title: Enhanced Productivity
solutions.description: Your team is bogged down by repetitive tasks. With automation, they can focus on strategic growth and innovation.

solutions.title: Competitive Edge
solutions.description: Delayed proposals slow your response time. With our system, be the first to respond and capture more opportunities.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Unleashed's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Unleashed around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Unleashed.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp's Digital Presence with Unleashed's Expertise.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Join us in a strategic transformation to boost efficiency and maximize online engagement with our comprehensive IT solutions.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently facing significant revenue losses due to inefficiencies.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves without converting is revenue walking out the door. Acme Corp is losing approximately 20% potential revenue monthly due to this issue.

problems.title: Outdated Technology
problems.description: Using outdated systems can lead to inefficiencies. This results in operational losses estimated at $50,000 annually.

problems.title: Inefficient Workflows
problems.description: Current workflows are not optimized, leading to a productivity loss of about 15% in employee efficiency.

problems.title: Security Vulnerabilities
problems.description: Security breaches could cost Acme Corp up to $100,000 in recovery and lost business each year.

problems.title: Poor User Experience
problems.description: A subpar user experience can drive clients away, with potential losses of up to 25% in user retention.

problems.title: Limited Data Insights
problems.description: Without proper data analytics, Acme Corp is missing out on insights that could improve decision-making, impacting growth by 10%.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Unleashed provides targeted solutions to address these critical losses for Acme Corp.

solutions.title: Website Optimization

solutions.title: Cybersecurity Services

solutions.title: Data Analytics

solutions.title: Workflow Automation
solutions.description: Streamlines processes to increase efficiency and reduce operational costs.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Track Record

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Approach

whyUsCards.title: Comprehensive Services
whyUsCards.description: From strategy to execution, we cover all your IT needs under one roof.

team.name: Muhammad Hutasuhut

lead.company_description:
Unleashed is a one-stop shop for leading web development, custom software and digital services. We create, enhance, integrate, manage, and host award-winning websites, web applications, and digital experiences through the continuous efforts of our certified developers and a team of creative digital strategists. At Unleashed, we utilize open-source platforms‚Äîthe most collaborative and dynamic solutions available for our clients' websites and system integrations. 
By living on the cutting edge of web technology and development, Unleashed has the proven experience and expertise to create award-winning digital experiences. As globally recognized web experts, we are committed to positioning our clients to fully realize digital potential through dynamic, engaging websites using open-source solutions. 

We're not afraid... 
...of inheriting legacy code. 
...of complex, third-party integrations. 
...of responding to your evolving needs. 

OUR SERVICES INCLUDE: 
:: Open Source Platforms (i.e., WordPress, Drupal, Symfony, Adobe Commerce)
:: Responsive Web Design
:: Web App Development
:: Optimization
:: Web Accessibility & Compliance
:: Systems Integrations
:: Web Personalization
:: e-Commerce Implementation
:: Creative and Design Services
:: DevOps and Hosting Services
:: Digital Marketing Services
:: Ongoing Support Services
